text: Moussa Faki Mahamat ( , born 21 June 1960) is a Chadian politician and diplomat. He was the 4th Chairperson of the African Union Commission from 2017 until 2025. He was Prime Minister of Chad from 24 June 2003 to 4 February 2005 and Minister of Foreign Affairs from April 2008 to January 2017.Page on Faki , Afrique Express . On 30 January 2017, he was elected as Chairperson of the African Union Commission. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Chairpersons of the African Union Commission Category:Prime ministers of Chad Category:Living people
title: Moussa Faki
